# Pull Request Template

## Description
Brief description of what this PR does and why it's needed.

## Type of Change
Please check the type of change your PR introduces:

- [ ] üêõ Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] ‚ú® New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)

- [ ] üìö Documentation update
- [ ] üîß Configuration update
- [ ] üéÆ New datapack addition
- [ ] üîå New plugin addition
- [ ] üèóÔ∏è Infrastructure/tooling change

## Security Considerations
- [ ] No security implications
- [ ] Security improvements included

- [ ] Security review completed

### Security Checklist (for configurations)
- [ ] No hardcoded credentials
- [ ] Appropriate file permissions
- [ ] Network security considered
- [ ] Access controls reviewed

## Quality Assurance
- [ ] Code follows project conventions
- [ ] Files are properly organized
- [ ] Naming conventions followed
- [ ] No sensitive information included

## Reviewer Checklist
<!-- For maintainers - do not fill out -->
- [ ] Change type is appropriate
- [ ] Testing is adequate
- [ ] Documentation is sufficient
- [ ] Security considerations addressed
- [ ] Performance impact acceptable
- [ ] Code quality meets standards

---

## Submission Guidelines
By submitting this pull request, I confirm that:

- [ ] I have read and followed the contribution guidelines
- [ ] My changes don't introduce security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have tested my changes thoroughly
- [ ] I have provided adequate documentation
- [ ] I understand this will be reviewed before merging

**Note**: Please ensure all checkboxes above are completed before submitting your PR. Incomplete PRs may be returned for additional work.
